tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE past_concerts (
    concert_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    concert_date DATE,
    setlist TEXT,
    attendance INT,
    reviews TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Review (
    review_id UUID,
    concert_id UUID,
    reviewer_name VARCHAR(50),
    review_text TEXT,
    rating INT,
    PRIMARY KEY (review_id)
);

CREATE TABLE reviews (
  review_id UUID NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY,
  concert_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  reviewer_name TEXT NOT NULL,
  rating INT NOT NULL,
  comment TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Concerts ( 
 concert_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, 
 artist_name VARCHAR(255), 
 venue_name VARCHAR(255), 
 concert_date DATE, 
 ticket_price DECIMAL 
 );

CREATE TABLE Setlists ( 
 setlist_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, 
 concert_id UUID, 
 song_title VARCHAR(255), 
 song_duration INTERVAL, 
 CONSTRAINT fk_concert_id FOREIGN KEY (concert_id) REFERENCES Concerts(concert_id) 
 );

CREATE TABLE Attendance ( 
 attendance_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, 
 concert_id UUID, 
 attendee_name VARCHAR(255), 
 ticket_type VARCHAR(100), 
 CONSTRAINT fk_concert_id FOREIGN KEY (concert_id) REFERENCES Concerts(concert_id) 
 );

CREATE TABLE Reviews ( 
 review_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, 
 concert_id UUID, 
 reviewer_name VARCHAR(255), 
 rating INT, 
 review_text TEXT, 
 CONSTRAINT fk_concert_id FOREIGN KEY (concert_id) REFERENCES Concerts(concert_id) 
 );
